attributes.action: Make a clear statement that the EU position on metrication does not change existing law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
and also publicise the point that the Imperial system as we know it was an 1820s revision of the previous system, undertaken because the metric system was felt to be superior to English measures.

Thirdly make the point that the US does not use the Imperial system and that 40% of US industry works in metric
